entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
